items.title: PVR Inox to challenge Bengaluru penalty order for 'wasting time' with 25-minute ads
items.description: The cinema advertising revenue has not gone back to pre-Covid levels, analysts tracking the exhibition business have said, and while the inventories have been filling up, the pricing is still muted.

items.title: Tata Motors announces discounts for EV buyers as sales cross 2 lakh milestone
items.description: The country’s top EV seller said it has launched a 45-day window during which customers can avail all the benefits, the statement said

items.title: Why, despite gaining market share, is the M&M stock falling?
items.description: Over the nine months ended FY2025, M&M gained 1.9 percentage points in PV market share to about 12 percent while the shares of Maruti Suzuki India, Hyundai India and Tata Motors fell

items.title: Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders: Execution strength, order pipeline to ensure growth
items.description: The company’s focus remains on executing existing orders and maintaining margins

items.title: Turbulent markets, tepid earnings -- Time to remain fearful or should you be greedy?
items.description: Investments made in times of all-round pessimism seldom fail to generate positive returns

items.title: Suzuki notes market share drop and rising competition in India, says need to 'rethink strategy'
items.description: The car company said India's 'business environment has changed' due to declining market share and intensified competition in the electric vehicles space, adding that the company needs to 'rethink strategy'.

items.title: India's growing fintech industry and the case for self-regulation
items.description: India’s fintech sector is rapidly growing, with over 9,000 firms contributing to the economy. Self-regulation is gaining traction as it ensures compliance, fosters innovation, and builds consumer trust. However, challenges like enforcement and conflicts of interest remain.

items.title: The battle for Religare is fast becoming a test of India's takeover laws
items.description: Legitimate takeovers must be honoured by existing boards and promoters

items.title: Centre looks to bring single regulatory framework for online gaming firms: Report
items.description: The newspaper said the home ministry has a formed a panel to find a way forward
